name: KKF.NEEM
description: Sunrise Computer Software Pvt. Ltd., funded By National Skill Development Corporation - NSDC as Innovation partner has developed an Interactive Experiential learning platform called Maharishi Augmented Reality System  MARS with a view to Skill, Scale, and Speed in Indias skilling domain.  Our vision is to implement a technology-enabled solution for imparting education and skill in an interactive way to the youth living in tier 1 to tier 5 villages of India & other developing countries. The profitable organization should also achieve a social goal of imparting Skills free of cost to persons who are differently able and/or economically very poor strata of society  For further information please connect us on:- email : marketing@sunrisecompusys.com Mob : +91 99231 91663
